author: rahul
msg: * Sample app war files did not contain LICENSE and NOTICE files in their META-INF directory. Move location to src/main/webapp/META-INF, rather than src/main/resources/META-INF so they are placed in the correct place in the war files.
* Sample app assemblies did not contain LICENSE and NOTICE files in the root directory. Modify assembly descriptors to pick up these files (from above location).

author: trustin
msg: Added JavaDoc that describes detailed protocol flow
